content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu Wang, nice to meet you. Let's talk about the rental price of my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: So, how much do you think is a reasonable price for a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I think a reasonable price for such an apartment would be around 1500 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see. Well, considering the location and amenities, I can offer you the apartment for 1800 Euros.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe your offer is too low for such a prime location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
How about 1700 Euros? It's a nice round number.
[SIMULATED_USER]]
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe your offer is still too low.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, how about 1600 Euros? It's the lowest I can go.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your offer is still lower than my expectations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Fine. How about 1550 Euros, and I'll throw in a free parking spot?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I'm not interested in a free parking spot. I'm only concerned about the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
